app_descript:
Capture The Magic

Brief: Capture the Magic turns your mobile device into a magical photo studio. Enhanced and more intuitive than ever, it allows you to create enthralling pictures featuring magical characters, like Santa, right in your own home. Perfect for the holiday season, or any special occasion, this app brings a touch of wonder to your family's memories.
